<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Inst;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If &#39;Inst&#39; is defined in this block and is an input that needs to be phi</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// translated, we need to incorporate the value into the expression or fail.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In either case, the instruction itself isn&#39;t an input any longer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    InstInputs.erase(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a086e9fbdb06276db7753101a08a63adf">find</a>(InstInputs, Inst));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is a PHI, go ahead and translate it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PHINode &#42;PN = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(Inst))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> addAsInput(PN-&gt;getIncomingValueForBlock(PredBB));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is a non-phi value, and it is analyzable, we can incorporate it</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ok, it must be an intermediate result (either because it started that way</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or because we just incorporated it into the expression).  See if its</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CastInst &#42;Cast = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;CastInst&gt;</a>(Inst)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!PHIIn) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PHIIn == Cast-&gt;getOperand(0))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Cast;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find an available version of this cast.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to simplify cast first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;V = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57b7707bae1b59648d9b09e7c3e1106c">simplifyCastInst</a>(Cast-&gt;getOpcode(), PHIIn, Cast-&gt;getType(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    &#123;DL, TLI, DT, AC&#125;)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="#a080cad1d991fe0de068a346aae7cb1be">RemoveInstInputs</a>(PHIIn, InstInputs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> addAsInput(V);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise we have to see if a casted version of the incoming pointer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is available.  If so, we can use it, otherwise we have to fail.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See if the add simplifies away.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;Res = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5e0af1b16cab9e0efc63a6ce9de2b9cc">simplifyAddInst</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>, isNSW, isNUW, &#123;DL, TLI, DT, AC&#125;)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we didn&#39;t modify the add, just return it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a> == Inst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#aa0a2cb1582d1cec317bd205085469ca1">getOperand</a>(0) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a> == Inst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#aa0a2cb1582d1cec317bd205085469ca1">getOperand</a>(1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Inst;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, see if we have this add available somewhere.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (User &#42;U : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a411cf3e3932f209ce3374cb31adc1da6">users</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BinaryOperator &#42;BO = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BinaryOperator&gt;</a>(U))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BO-&gt;getOpcode() == Instruction::Add &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">            BO-&gt;getOperand(0) == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a9e1483f7215664a2315c53c3558d9a8d">LHS</a> &amp;&amp; BO-&gt;getOperand(1) == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">            BO-&gt;getParent()-&gt;getParent() == CurBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a1b4bf7c97cdc8159fd73d48063f0b250">getParent</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">            (!DT || DT-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree/#a5c69311e8d44898dac36a155c3d8691d">dominates</a>(BO-&gt;getParent(), PredBB)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BO;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, we failed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// PHITranslateValue - PHI translate the current address up the CFG from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// CurBB to Pred, updating our state to reflect any needed changes.  If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#39;MustDominate&#39; is true, the translated value must dominate PredBB.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MustDominate) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(DT || !MustDominate);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phitransaddr/#a706fc677031e5d0fc38869aed8478491">verify</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid PHITransAddr!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DT &amp;&amp; DT-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree/#a1a70f2c359aadd76a72aaaede16aca4a">isReachableFromEntry</a>(PredBB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Addr = translateSubExpr(Addr, CurBB, PredBB, DT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Addr = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phitransaddr/#a706fc677031e5d0fc38869aed8478491">verify</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid PHITransAddr!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Inst = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f6182886dc2f96c204299e92c1565d5">dyn&#95;cast&#95;or&#95;null&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(Addr))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!DT-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree/#a5c69311e8d44898dac36a155c3d8691d">dominates</a>(Inst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>(), PredBB))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// PHITranslateWithInsertion - PHI translate this value into the specified</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// predecessor block, inserting a computation of the value if it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// unavailable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// All newly created instructions are added to the NewInsts list.  This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// returns null on failure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phitransaddr/#aa4b823fe521dfaefebd59ddf5f7f6bd7"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phitransaddr/#aa4b823fe521dfaefebd59ddf5f7f6bd7">PHITransAddr::translateWithInsertion</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;CurBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;PredBB,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Attempt to PHI translate with insertion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Addr = insertTranslatedSubExpr(Addr, CurBB, PredBB, DT, NewInsts);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"></CodeLine>
